title: Mushroom and smoked bacon risotto
ingredients: ['1 litre hot vegetable stock, made with stock cubes', '50g butter', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '300g arborio rice', '150ml dry white wine', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, or snipped chives', '6 rashers of smoked, streaky, rindless bacon', '2 tsp olive oil', '300g sliced chestnut mushrooms', '50g Parmesan cheese']
